name: Emma
body:
## Emma - artificial intelligence for frontline wildlife crime detection

![Emma in action](https://www.dropbox.com/s/viy8spqr0hhu6i8/emma_screenshot-w400.jpg?dl=1)

### You can try out the prototype very easily:

1. Get [Telegram messenger](http://telegram.org), and create an account. It's available for most smartphones and also on desktop.
2. Send a message to @AskEmmaBot to start a conversation.
3. Send her either a binomial or part of a common name, and she'll do her best to reply.

#### Caveats

It's a prototype to demonstrate the concept: the results might be wrong, the search might fail, the service might break. Please [report any problems](mailto:emma-wildlife@peoplesized.com)


![Emma is a person!](https://www.dropbox.com/s/5s102rcfydt0q7q/Screenshot%202015-06-29%2011.24.50.png?dl=1)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
